GameConditionDef.label: gelatinous memory echo
GameConditionDef.description: The superorganism retains echoes of past events, stored like data in a living neural lattice. These memory echoes occasionally (every 2 days) bleed into reality, causing inspirations, mood boosts, penalties... or hallucinations.

GameConditionDef.label: ambient radiation
GameConditionDef.description: Low levels of background radiation permeate the area, subtly affecting health and mutation rates, and causing gene mutations in random colonists every quadrum or so.

GameConditionDef.label: extreme temperature fluctuations
GameConditionDef.description: Wild swings between scorching days and freezing nights challenge survival and crop stability.

GameConditionDef.label: exploding animals
GameConditionDef.description: Something in this area makes all animals explode violently on death.

GameConditionDef.label: moldy environment
GameConditionDef.description: The ubiquitous presence of fungal spores makes staying outdoors almost unbearable.
